description: We are seeking a contractor to conduct semi-structured telephone interviews with approximately 145 respondents. The list of respondents will be provided by the technical authority based on the financing awarded by the CSA in the past seven years. The contractor will be responsible for validating and updating the list of respondents.
duration_in_months: Bidder's contact details will be collected by the technical authority.
full_summary:
# Semi-structured Interviews for the Measurement of Departmental Indicator of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA)

## ID and Title

* **Reference Number**: cb-8059-77272429
* **Title (English)**: Semi-structured interviews for the measurement of departmental indicator of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* **Title (French)**: Entrevues semi-structurées pour la mesure d’un indicateur ministériel de l'Agence spatiale canadienne (ASC)

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 9F037-22-0257
* **Publication Date**: August 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 25, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Supplier Details

* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Description of the Requirement

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) requires a contractor to develop an interview guide and conduct semi-structured telephone interviews to gather information on the reuse of technologies and expertise acquired through a CSA contract, grant, or contribution on Earth or in space. The contractor must validate and update the list of respondents, validate the list of respondents, and conduct the interviews with approximately 145 respondents. The interviews are expected to last about 15 minutes.

The contractor will be responsible for:

* Developing an interview guide with a series of questions to gather information on the reuse of technologies and expertise acquired through a CSA contract, grant, or contribution on Earth or in space.
* Conducting semi-structured telephone interviews with approximately 145 respondents.
* Validating and updating the list of respondents provided by the technical authority.

## Administration

* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Space Agency
* **Address**: 6767, route de l'Aéroport, St-Hubert, QC, J3Y 8Y9
* **Contact Person**: Valérie Geoffroy, valerie.geoffroy@asc-csa.gc.ca

## Documents

Attachments can be found at [https://canadabuys.ca/](https://canadabuys.ca/).

Note: This revised version is 400 words or less and rephrased in a more professional tone, while maintaining the essential details of the original text.
